post.title: How to build web apps using Next.js
post.content:
[Next](https://nextjs.org) offers an interactive course that will guide you through how to get started with Next.js.

In their tutorial, you’ll learn Next.js basics by creating a very simple blog app. Here’s an example of the [final result](https://next-learn-starter.vercel.app).

You can follow the [tutorial here](https://nextjs.org/learn/basics/create-nextjs-app).

Happy learning!

seo.title: How to build web apps using Next.js
seo.description: In this tutorial you will learn how to build web applications using Next.js
